subject: Football
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Vikings quarterback Tarvaris Jackson hurt his right knee Saturday night and was removed in the first quarter of a preseason game against the Ravens in Baltimore. He was hurt on a tackle by Ravens linebacker Antwan Barnes. The extent of the injury was not immediately known. Jackson, who had thrown for 82 yards and a touchdown, was replaced by Gus Frerotte.
